dialogs.save_folder:
SnapEnhance requires Storage permissions to download and Save Media from Snapchat.
Please choose the location where media should be downloaded to.

mappings.generate_failure_no_snapchat: SnapEnhance was unable to detect Snapchat, please try reinstalling Snapchat.
mappings.generate_failure: An error occurred while trying to generate mappings, please try again.
mappings.dialog: To dynamically support a wide range of Snapchat Versions, mappings are necessary for SnapEnhance to function properly, this should not take more than 5 seconds.
